contents.text: Welcome to TEKsystems in San Francisco, where we're building tomorrow's workforce today.
If you are a job seeker looking to build your career, press 1.
To speak with our recruitment team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our recruiters.

navigationGoals: Connect me to a recruiter to explore current job openings.
I want to speak with a recruiter about tech roles tailored for veterans in San Francisco.
Connect with a recruiter to explore full-stack development opportunities in your San Francisco office.
I need to speak with a recruiter about tech job opportunities and any accommodations I might need.
I’d like to speak with a recruiter about internship opportunities in computational physics.

contents.text: To check the status of your application, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your application status.

navigationGoals: Check the current status of my submitted job application.
I need to check the status of my application for the veteran tech training program.
Check the status of my application for the microservices engineer role.
I want to check the status of my recent job application.
I want to check the status of my application for the research assistant position.

contents.text: If you are a company seeking tech talent, press 2.
To discuss tailored staffing solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a staffing specialist.

navigationGoals: Speak with a staffing specialist about tailored tech hiring solutions.
I’m calling to discuss customized staffing solutions for my veteran-owned tech startup.
Discuss tailored staffing solutions for our DevOps automation project.
I need to discuss tailored IT staffing solutions for my small business.
I’d like to discuss staffing options for my student-led quantum simulation project.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a recent invoice and billing details for our account.
I have a question about the invoice on my company’s staffing services account.
Review billing details and get an itemized breakdown of last month’s contractor invoices.
I have a question about a recent invoice and need to speak with billing.
I need information on billing for our group's recent staffing services.
